attributes.action: Give the Red Arrows the opportunity to perform at the opening of the 2012 Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop all the PC Madness and allow the RED ARROWS to perform as part of the opening ceremony at the 2012 Olympics. The are a representation of both the birth of flight and a continuation of british excellence in aerospace and engineering.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
